thread.title: Broker Tullett Prebon’s Head of Alternatives to Leave - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Laurence Fletcher
title: Broker Tullett Prebon’s Head of Alternatives to Leave - MoneyBeat - WSJ

organizations.name: tax change helps bank of america

text: The global head of alternative investments at TP ICAP’s Tullett Prebon unit is to leave the firm, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest departure to hit the alternatives team at the world’s biggest interdealer broker. London-based Alastair Sword, a former Bank of America Merrill Lynch banker, was appointed two years ago   City PM: Why Sorrell's Exit Could Work for WPP, Tax Change Helps Bank of America's Bottom Line
